website_summaries.verdict: An affordable electric blanket with some quality control issues.
pros: Dual controls use two different outlets to minimize chance of overheating and give individuals more control
Main power cord is at bottom of blanket, which is preferable for many
cons: Rare incidents of faulty wiring in the main power cord reported
Internal heating wires are thicker than competitors

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY THIS - Controllers don't match
customer_reviews.text: The weather finally changed and I opened up my electric blanket. Well....not a good sign when the controls don't match each other. I plugged it in anyway as my window to return the blanket closed in October. One side works, the other, not so much. I'm going to have to buy a new blanket. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: If you live someplace that gets cold, you'll want this.
customer_reviews.text: These heated blankets are a must for cold weather! We have had several of the Biddeford brand heated blankets, and replace after 5-7 years of nightly winter use in the Northeast US. Nothing beats getting into a warm bed in winter, and we all prefer the blanket to a heated mattress pad, because if you get too warm during the night, you can simply move the blankets off of you versus being stuck on a hot mattress. Twin and full come with a single controller, and queen and king offer two controllers (1 for each side of the bed). Cannot recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: JOK says

customer_reviews.title: ... have owned several electric blankets and this is the worst one of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several electric blankets and this is the worst one of the bunch. The heat has never been constant and now it stopped working after the return option ran out. I don't recommend this blanket or brand. I suspect that the control units have a serious problem
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Toasty roasty
customer_reviews.text: Toasty roasty even on the coldest nights. Good price & good service.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: Warmth finally!!! I have had the same electric blanket (sunbeam) for about 5 years and it NEVER got warm quickly and never got very warm. My room is down in a basement and never gets very warm so I was getting SUPER frustrated. This blanket is as warm as a cuddly stuffed animal and since I'm single, it keeps me warm without anyone else in my bed! It's awesome. It heats up super fast and is so soft. It has an automatic shut off, so I don't even have to worry. The controls are a little bulky, but I don't mind cause it works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: MY husband is on hospice and has severe pain. Wanted something light weight but warm. this sounded ideal. It is lightweight and that is good. But it works so inconsistently as to be worthless. It heats up moderately well but then loses all heat unless i unplug and replug when it reheats for a short while and then gets cold. Not helpful when trying to get someone comfortable over time. I am so disappointed. We need a light weight electric blanket that warms consistently.
customer_reviews.author: ever optimistic

customer_reviews.title: love electric blankets!!
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought Biddeford electric blankets, so got another new one right after Christmas. I wasn't sure I wanted a fleece one as the ones I've seen in stores are very wimpy & lose their shape fast. But this material holds its shape and pulls up very nicely when I make the bed!! The heat settings are true & change correctly.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for my mother who needed something to keep her warm because her roommate keeps the house too cool for her comfort. So far, she had used it almost daily & nightly for 3 months straight until summer arrived and it seems to be still working perfectly. She absolutely loves it! I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I have had electric blankets that cost hundreds of dollars. In this case, more expensive is not better! I first used these when I was a guest in a home. I was very impressed at how quickly they heat up. they are soft and seem to hold up better than the more expensive brands. They go on sale pretty often and I got a king for $79. I will definitely buy another. Even if they don't last 20 years, for what I paid I won't feel the same disappointment I would as if I paid $200!
customer_reviews.author: Lyfeizgudd

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket, I prefer this kind over the other
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice plush softness to it, that I like over the scratchy rough competitors. Also the 'cords' that run in this are more pliable than the harsh rough steel belted cable that runs through others. The controller is a bit on the crude side, but it DOES turn off after 10 hours on its own... even though you still see the light on, and have to flip the manual switch to 'off' to turn the unit off. Decent warming blanket, has helped many winter nights... and the cat absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: IncredibleHat

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on Amazon. All electric blankets on Amazon poorly rated
customer_reviews.text: This electric blanket has a reasonable positive approval by purchases through Amazon, however there are too many disappointed buyers feeding back with factual information that this product failed in a short period of time, with one feed back that this product caused a fire to happen within the blanket. This is not a purchase that I feel very comfortable about ?
customer_reviews.author: gejome

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: This appears used. No plastic covering the plug ins like regular purchased blankets. That's wrong.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: That I filled out the product registration and that it was purchased with Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: This blanket worked great at first but withing 3 months started to no longer heat, I even tried switching the controller to see if that was the issue and nothing helped, working on a product resolution. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Control does not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my spare bedroom. It is used 2 nights per week (at most). The control on the Right hand side quit working after 10 nights of use.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Freece

customer_reviews.title: ID buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has an incredible price with the quality I expected. It remains in place on my bed without sliding around like the "fleece" or "microfiber plush" blankets have. I will certainly buy from this company again. The only downside is there is no preheat feature so I have to turn it on earlier than blankets offering the preheat feature. Again, I would buy the same blanket over as its quality, price, and durability well make up for no preheat setting!
customer_reviews.author: MClark1692

customer_reviews.title: love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I freeze all the time during the night. The other heating blanket I had finally kicked the bucket. I love the color and the feel of the blanket. It also heats up so quick and I love it. nice warm and toasty during the night. I will def buy again if I need one
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Different controls
customer_reviews.text: It has dual controls that are totally different. It looks strange to walk in the bedroom and see one color & type on the left nightstand & a different type & color on the other nightstand. There must be an internal error. I will contact Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: 2 different blankets quit working within a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket doesn’t last a season of use! Purchased one it quit working shortly after purchasing. Amazon replaced it with a new one. The second worked from March though May. Put on the bed when my mother came again in late December and again it will not work. Of course long after the 30day return day.
customer_reviews.author: amma3

customer_reviews.title: Lost heating after 5 months of use
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it the heating features were fully functional. After 5 months of use the blanket only heats a very slight amount when on the max setting. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Auto-off doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: On the whole, I've been happy with this product. It heats up quickly and I enjoy the multiple heat settings. My only complaint is that the auto-off feature doesn't appear to work. I will let it go more than 8 hours and the blanket is still warm, the indicator light still on. my husband believes the heat will shut off on his side, just not the indicator light.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clegg

customer_reviews.title: the perfect blanket for me
customer_reviews.text: a light weight fabric with robust heat, heats evenly (unlike some that overheat the torso and leave feet&legs cold). The analog controller is wonderful, a toggle switch for on and off, and a rotary dial to adjust the amount of heat...... and no error codes, unlike a previous much more expensive digital controller blanket (different brand) I purchased- seller delivered quickly and well packaged-
customer_reviews.author: D. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: 2 separate plug in units. Not one long tangled cord ness.
customer_reviews.text: Better than anticipated. Long time electric blanket owner. Love the color. Like it better than the velour Type. BIDDEFORD CONTROLS EACH HAS SEPARATE PLUG IN CORD , so much easier to put together *****
customer_reviews.author: Markann Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Very good blanket. I have had problems with digital control blankets in the past so I was looking for the regular number dial controls. This blanket was exactly what I was looking for. It was a gift for my mom and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise5262

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased thinking I was buying quality.. I live in Florida so not used much. Bought two kept one in the closet for guests, but never used until the first one quit after one season😒. So I took out the second one first of the week, it lasted three nights and did the same thing the first one did, it quit working. No light on the control no heat. Junk, don't buy these electric blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Blanket gets Very Hot
customer_reviews.text: The blanket material is very thin,unlike the previous one I had with the digital control. It gets very hot on any setting above 1 or 2. I turn my heat down at night and sometimes wake up sweating..I don't like the temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't buy products like this over the Internet
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this blanket when I bought it. I usually don't buy products like this over the Internet, however, it was into winter when our last one gave up the ghost. This is lightweight but that works because of the heating elements. I haven't had it long but so far I'm pretty happy with it. I did buy the Square Trade agreement with this product though. I've been thrilled with Square Trade for a long time now so there is that too!
customer_reviews.author: SewAmused

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: We have had a long, long winter and in the midst of it my old electric blanket gave up the ghost. This replaced that blanket. It is so warm and the control is easy to use and the blanket warms up quickly. The blanket itself is soft and I particularly like that it more than adequately fits my full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. GroveTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - Not Worth Price!
customer_reviews.text: >Cords a mile long so unnecessary and there are TWO sets of cords and HUGE temperature gages. I had to wrap the cords up in bands because they get all tangled. >The blanket is not very soft and VERY think you can feel the heating elements under them. >Heat is inconsistent and when I turn up MAX on both gages I have to fold the blanket 4 times to get warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the reviews and figured I would give it a try. I've purchased electric blankets over the yrs, they DO NOT do what they're suppose to do. This electric blanket from biddeford has exceeded everything. The heat is felt throughout the entire blanket ( not just here and there). I like the settings, I've had some electric blankets in the past that I would put on a high setting and still couldn't feel anything. This one, you can feel the warmth and I love the feel of the material. My dog and I have absolutely enjoyed it, no complaints from her either. LOL!. You won't go wrong by this blanket. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: armybrat67

customer_reviews.title: Mildly Heated Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Not a serious heated blanket, but is a mildly warming blanket. Like the weight of it, but the heating wires are not secured and just lay loose in wide channels with plenty of extra warming wire length.. Okay, if using it to warm the bed before retiring, but then turn it off. Would not sleep with it operating, LIke the control units, solid and noiseless.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for an electric blanket not slippery like some blankets out there.
customer_reviews.text: This blankets is just perfect for us. It’s easy to set up and use, I like the softness and real blanket feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get as warm as the first one I bought, but a nice blanket. On another note: I'm sure UPS does things right, most of the time, or they'd be out of business, but I have never, let me repeat, NEVER, has a smooth delivery from UPS and this was no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these blankets last year and loved it so much that since then we have bought THREE more! How did I ever live through the winter without the coziness? Really fabulous. Also, they turn off after a certain amount of time. Great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, mostly
customer_reviews.text: The wires are extremely apparent when handling, but yknow what? It heats up hot. Sometimes only on one side or the other (make sure it’s not folded anywhere), but it does the job of heating up my bed before I get in it! It was cheap, and you get what you pay for. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: lowest setting is perfect. anything higher and its too hot (in my ...
customer_reviews.text: lowest setting is perfect. anything higher and its too hot (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dahlquist

customer_reviews.title: Really nice...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Tho there does seem to be a little loss in the short time I've had it, I've had to go from a 3 to a 5 or 7, but I'll adjust it during the night as well. To be fair the house has gotten cooler as well due to cooler temps outside, but I paid for the extended warranty, which has it covered for 5 years. The Sunbeam only really lasted me about a year before really noticeable issues, but so far my wife and I have really liked this.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Young

customer_reviews.title: Not a good electric blanket
customer_reviews.text: I give this heating blanket both thumbs down. It does not get very warm on its highest setting and the lowest setting you can't even tell it's on. The blanket part is a nice sturdy blanket but that's the only good thing about it. 👎👎😒
customer_reviews.author: Thine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it was to small and yet I have not received my refund. I’m very disappointed because I can’t buy the larger size until I get my refund for this one. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ultra soft heating blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love the electric blanket it heats the entire body. The control setting is true to selection. Perfect for if you desire a lot of heat or just warmth. I'm glad that I made this purchase and I will purchase more soon for the remaining beds.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: No long heats up
customer_reviews.text: The blanket died a few months after getting it, just after the return window closed. Very disappointed, shortest lasting electric blanket we’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I did not like. The controls work well and the blanket heats very well and is very ample in size and very soft. Loved it wish I had purchased it years ago. I had a Sunbeam and it never worked that great. This one is ten times better.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work; company made it right
customer_reviews.text: The first night the blanket was great. After that one side did not heat. Very disappointed. Before returning it to Amazon, I called Biddeford Customer Care. After a little troubleshooting, it was determined the controller was bad, and the company is sending a new controller.
customer_reviews.author: J Reno

customer_reviews.title: Ike the replacement blanket... the controls not so much.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a less than three month old blanket which stopped heating on one side. The replacement is the same except the controls. We like the new controls much less , the blanket is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie E. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy best Electra blanket I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Biddeford Blanket. It’s so soft, and a beautiful mist color. I washed it when it first arrived on delicate cycle and it turned out great. Dried it on low. I love the range of temperatures and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: karrenk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Blanket barely even gets warm on one side. Other side doesn't get warm at all. Not worth the money. Returned first blanket for same issue and the replacement does the same thing. DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the lightness and softness of this blanket. It's my second Biddeford blanket. I had to order another because I mistakenly threw out the controls thinking they were for an unused heated mattress cover. Now I have 2 blankets and one set of controls. It is the only blanket we use on the bed, replacing 2 non-heated blankets we used before.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore T. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: My favoritei
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for a of years. I find they last about 2 years and then need replacement. This is a good as the others I have owned. They are the right weight for me and I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a few months ago. I only use it to warm my bed for 15-20 minutes & then shut it off. It had very limited use & now it doesn't work at all. I am outside of the normal return window so I only received $30 refund instead of $38. It costs me $8 to use a defective item for a few months I guess it should have stopped working within 30 days so I could receive a full refund. An offer to replace the item would have been a better solution. I have since purchased a competitors's blanket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it heats up or not
customer_reviews.text: It does not heat up. I put it on the highest heat already
customer_reviews.author: 8ball

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good quality & works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blanket. It's soft and better quality than the Sunbeam one I had previously. Works well - heats up fast and gets really warm on High setting. I just have to convince myself to turn it down before I go to sleep or I wake up roasting. But it feels so good.....
customer_reviews.author: R2D2

customer_reviews.title: Comfy cozy
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in a cold room and this blanket is comfy cozy. It is a bit heavier weight then the old style which in comparison seem flimsy. Love it, ordered one for my granddaughter too
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket feels like felt and doesn't look that great. My mother in-law wanted to keep it anyway in case hers goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing! Heats up really fast. It says it has an auto off feature, but sometimes I leave it on all night and wake up and it's still on. Besides that it's great. It came in the mail fast. I got it in the green, and it is the exact same color.
customer_reviews.author: biology major

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality, I have one I ordered the week before from someone else and its quality of fabric is almost like a nightgown. Love the sellers on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Groombridge

customer_reviews.title: it does heat up nicely and keeps me warm at night
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is much thinner than the Biddeford blanket I bought four years ago. I'm not sure if they come in different varieties, but I was expecting an exact replacement. However, it does heat up nicely and keeps me warm at night, so it will do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I really like the blanket
customer_reviews.text: I really like the blanket, heats up fast, lots of temperature settings, but doesn't appear to automatically shut off as specified.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: It's a bummer because it really is a comfy blanket and the one I bought for my cousin the other year still works great for her. Going to try one more time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Heated Blanket for several months (duel control for king size.) It's one of the best I've owned over the years. I place a lightweight cotton blanket on top and it keeps me warm on #4 setting. We keep out heat at 60 at night. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Biddeford Blanket that I have owned. It is very soft and snuggly, ample size, heats very fast, with the two controls, my side can be one temp and the other a lower temp for my cats. They just love it. I like the green color, very pleased. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars if it could have the heating coils a bit higher on the head, and the controls are quite stiff. One is somewhat hard to tturn. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: MJJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used Biddeford electric blankets for many years and been happy with them. However this Biddeford electric blanket hasn't worked from the first time. I didn't expect any problems so tossed all paperwork. So now it's cold and I regret my purchase every night.. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Does not get very warm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is soft.......but it does not get very warm and you have to have it at 9 or on High to warm up your bed. Not what I expected for Biddeford as far as heating goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Galicia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these and this is the first time the controls went out! will contact amazon
customer_reviews.author: brenda hill

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the heat on
customer_reviews.text: My wife is cold natured and likes it hot, I like it hot but not when I sleep so this was a great option for us. We can choose our temp and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The softness and warmth entice you to come to bed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I sleep in a king size bed and find that one of us is always needing more heat on one side than on the other. We find that even though the blanket is light weight with dual controls we can both find the right heat setting for both of us. We would buy this blanket over again!
customer_reviews.author: Doll1956

customer_reviews.title: Does what its suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like the controller to be heavier so that the cords don't move it at will.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Bargery

customer_reviews.title: Customer Servie
customer_reviews.text: Biddeford really means it when they say: customer SERVICE. Never, ever have I experienced that quality of service. The rep went beyond the call to please me. It was outstanding!!!! Note to outsourcing!
customer_reviews.author: fran h.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two years
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was pretty good. It stopped working almost exactly two years from purchase, and I only used it a few months of each of the two years, in the coldest weather. Doesn’t seem like good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Love being warm.
customer_reviews.text: We received this blanket 2 days ago and we are loving it. I was worried about the lightness and the wires would be felt due to the thinness,but we do not notice either issue. Love the product and a great deal money wise.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Can be turned on and off with an external timer
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm and toasty in a frigid room. The main reason I bought this one was that it can be put on a timer to go on just before bedtime. If I had perfect memory I could turn it one each night but... All the other electronic ones available just don't work for my application
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket. Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket! My husband is an invalid and needs extra warmth. I keep this on his bed year round since I can adjust the heat from very low to high. I haven't had to wash it yet but I'll update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Linda

customer_reviews.title: Controls not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Brother. The blanket is nice, but the controls do not work. They work intermittently but not consistently. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Foxworthy

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one how to send it back I got another one how to send that one back so so I got a different electric blanket now
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blanket and Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 blankets as a gift for a needy family and they loved them so much, I bought 3 more for other family members!
customer_reviews.author: Tee D Gee

customer_reviews.title: A comfy way to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second set Biddeford Blankets we've ordered. The first set was about 5 years ago and performed great, now we put that set in the guest room. We like the the dual control that lets each person select their heat level. It works well and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of heating blankets. I bought this one bc I have another one with the same heating device. I had another brand and it only lasted less than a year. This brand and heating blanket LASTS. I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use control. Only color is green. Although I’d love another choice in color, ( I bought 2) product is very nice, fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: does not heat up
customer_reviews.text: I order it on November 7th and 2 wks ago I put it on my bed , I have had the control on High and still barely feel any warmth. I Want a new Blanket How can I get one to replace this this is the second time i have ordered the same electric Blanket and the do not heat up has to be on 10 to feel the heat. I would like to retrun it but do not want the same product and I want a label to return it back by UPS
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Day

customer_reviews.title: Piece of  junk
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package I quicky discovered that it didn't work. Tried the reset instrctions to no avail,
customer_reviews.author: Rose S

customer_reviews.title: Did you are satisfied with the product that you ordered online
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so soft comfortable the temperature is excellent, it keep you warm in cold nights. I Am So Satisfied great deal excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Lershelle Steward

customer_reviews.title: Seems a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Heats well, controls are simple. Delivery complaint - I tried to order the version with the analog control, because they are easier to use when you cannot see the controller. The version with the digital control was delivered instead. Not happy with the switch, even though the product delivered is listed at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cal

customer_reviews.title: Bad Controllers
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked well for 7 months, then the controller quit. The difficulty of returning it for warranty through Biddeford made me decide to just buy a new controller. It quit working within just a few minutes, a burned electrical smell emanating from it. I will not deal with Biddeford ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gelvin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this blanket..
customer_reviews.text: Blanket too light.controls don't function U have to put on 9 or 10 the highest heat..that's not even hot enough Dissatisfied with this blanket..
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for the guest room, but the guests say it’s wonderful. So what more could you want. I like the thin-ness of the blanket, it’s very lighweight. Yep, I’d recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: Was a smart purchase, especially with cold temps and all the snow we’ve been receiving
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: How soft it is and the color sage is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Jo Black

customer_reviews.title: Received a replacement with better controls. Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this one, because one control stopped working after only 5 months. Sent it to Biddeford for repair or replacement. Received a replacement with better controls. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: So soft and warm.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is lightweight, very soft, and heats up quickly. Would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Flower

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the blanket only one side heated up. We put it right back in the package. We never slept under it. I opted not to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Villagegal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my sister who lives up north. She loved it said it nice to get into a warm bed
customer_reviews.author: D. Goguen

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Love to sleep nice and warm and Biddeford makes the best blankets they make the same blankets for Canon
customer_reviews.author: "D" from Queens

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my Biddeford Electric Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so awesome! It's not like the blankets of old. It's thin and soft and warm warm warm. I haven't had to turn it up above 1 and it's more than enough warmth! =)
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: It may be cold outside, but it's warm in my bed
customer_reviews.text: The dual controls allows my wife to keep her side the temperature of a blast furnace at full power, while mine is just a little warm to stave off winter chills. Nothing too fancy, but it works as advertised and allows me to reduce my utility bill by turning down the heat at night.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius James

customer_reviews.title: blanket
customer_reviews.text: love the blanket and this is my second one. It soft, very washable
customer_reviews.author: Mary Talbott

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for three months....  Don’t spend the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket eleven months ago. It worked for the three months that I needed it last winter. Now that it’s getting cold, I pulled it out of my linen closet to use it again. But it doesn’t work. It isn’t heating up. Don’t spend your money on something that only lasts for three months!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Blankets
customer_reviews.text: That’s is the best blanket ever and I will get some of the blankets and give the blanket for Christmas to all of my friends and family Thanks your all
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mayhall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Warms the bed up before crawling in for the night. So comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrica Swanick

customer_reviews.title: Good heating blanket for the price
customer_reviews.text: This heating blanket works well. It’s slightly heavier than I expected and I thought the fabric would be very soft. It was a little itchy, but I have sensitive skin, so I placed it in between a sheet and under the comforter which worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Analog electric blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality old fashion analog electric blanket. No computer circuits, only long lasting sturdy bimetal temp sensing circuitry. Just like grandma's blanket!
customer_reviews.author: PoppieJoe

customer_reviews.title: Electric Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice blanket my grandson uses it even if it's on low as he likes the warm blanket to sleep with. It stays warm but not to hot for my grandson and he doesn't want to sleep in any room without a electric blanket so grandma lets him have his way. I don't have to worry if he turns it on high as it doesn't get hot enough to burn him as some do. This is his pick so grandma has to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Not a great product or return policy
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after approx. 10 uses. There is a warranty through Biddeford, however, I am to pay to return defective blanket and will not be reimbursed this time. For the next blanket from Biddeford that I need to return (really?) they will cover the shipping cost. Very dissapointed with this blanket and their policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Biddeford Blankets, LLC Comfort Knit Heated Blanket, Queen, Fawn
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:FawnComfort Knit Heated Blanket featuring analog controller Twin/Full single control, Queen/King dual controls, Therapeutic Warmth, Machine Washable, 5-year in your choice of colors Cloud Blue, Sage, Fawn, Natural, and Grey.
feature_bullets: Packaged in a reusable zipper bag with handle
Twin/Full size comes with one controller, Queen/King size comes with two controllers
